app_descript:
Going Balls

Brief: Going Balls is an exhilarating ball-rolling platformer game that invites players into a realm of twisting and turning tracks. With a staggering 200 million downloads, this game is a definitive hit among thrill-seekers and puzzle enthusiasts looking for their next great challenge.
